div.head: 水穀
div.div: water and grain liquid and solid food water grain

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: water and grain liquid and solid food water grain

sense.def: ①Liquid and solid food. Su wen 素問 43: 榮者，水穀之精氣也 , “The camp [qi], that is the essence qi of water and grain ”.
② Physiological Notion of a type of grain. SWBJQYBMJ Fj: 麻，木穀而治風；豆，水穀而治 水 “Sesame is a wood grain and cures wind [disease]. Beans are a water grain and cure water [disease]”.
